Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and performance that exceeds expectations. Considering its unique features and unparalleled benefits, we believe it is valued at $1200000. We understand that the true worth of this product may vary depending on your specific needs and goals, but we are confident that it will provide significant value to you. If you're interested in exploring the possibilities of how this product can enhance your life or business, please let us know. We look forward to discussing this opportunity with you further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
